post.text:
Yesterday we had a historic rally in Selma, NC. More than 17,500 people attended and 7M+ saw it on Facebook. Numbers that are unheard of!

If you missed it, watch last night's LIVE broadcast here.

We won't win unless you VOTE. Learn more: www.Vote.GOP

comment.author: Jasmine
comment.text: My son is a senior in high school, and is trying hard for an NROTC scholarship, he is going to be a pilot one day for the Navy. I do NOT want him fighting with Hillary in office!!!

replies.author: Edan
replies.text: My son is a pilot with the US Air Force. I don't want him to be flying for Killary either !!!!

replies.author: Tesla
replies.text: But you'd rather they fly for a man who thinks that more countries should have nuclear weapons?
